name: Disposal Disaster
description:
Have you ever asked the question, What happens to the blocks in tetris when they disappear? 

In this short Game Jam game, with the theme of productivity. Build your way out of the disposal containment room before you are deleted from existance. 

Basic contol:

W,A,S,D  - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look around

Left mouse click - Pick up object

Scroll wheel (While holding object) - Bring closer or move object away.

Tip: A yellow sphere will indicate the position of where you will pick up an object.
